StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: PROCSELECTEVERYTHING
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE PROCSELECTEVERYTHING(parent_id IN integer, cursor_ OUT SYS_REFCURSOR)
AS

BEGIN

OPEN cursor_ FOR
SELECT t1.id, catname,root_parent_id
FROM category
JOIN
( SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT id AS id, id AS root_parent_id
FROM category
WHERE CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF = 1 AND id = parent_id
CONNECT BY parent_id = PRIOR id
ORDER BY id) t1
ON t1.id = category.id;
END;
